title: i drew this red card katarina as an offering for 5 rp
body:
forgive me rp overlords i am new to imgur and the boards and im not even sure if i linked this right please and thank you

{{sticker:katarina-love}}

replies.body: Dat's a nice Kat! Definitely deserving of 5 RP ^_^! Be sure to double check your RP total next time you login.
if you squint her eye kind of looks like it has a scar on it
